### Grass Cutting and Landscaping Services at 19 Wing, CFB Comox, Lazo, BC
**Project ID: CX240302**
** Tender Reference:** MX-43084920735
**Contract Number:** CX240302_SC81812

**Notice Date:** April 5, 2024
**Tender Closing Date and Time:** April 30, 2024 at 17:00:00

**Contract Notice URL:**
https://www.merx.com/public/solicitations/2863157679/abstract?language=EN
https://www.merx.com/public/solicitations/2863157679/abstract?language=FR (French)

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking a contractor to provide grass cutting and landscaping services at 19 Wing, CFB Comox. The services include supply of labor, materials, supervision, and equipment necessary to perform grass cutting and landscaping services.

**Contract Period:**
The Contract is expected to commence on **April 1, 2024** and end on **October 31, 2024**. The total estimated cost for the Contract is in the range of CAD **$975,000**, inclusive of all planned change orders and optional extensions.

**Request for Bids Procedure:**
The Request for Bids (RFB) is being conducted in accordance with the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA).

Bidders must obtain the RFB documents from the MERX website **(http://www.merx.com)**. The Bid submission and Evaluation process will be governed by the procedures outlined in the RFB documents.  Bidders are responsible for ensuring their complete bids are submitted in accordance with the instructions contained in the RFB documents.

The Official Language Requirement may be applied; Voirhttps://www.tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca/eng/cll-laa/langeuage.html 

**Requirements and Exclusions:**

*   The contractor is required to provide all necessary personnel, equipment, materials, and labor to perform the work.
*   The contractor is responsible for maintaining a safe working environment and complying with all applicable laws, regulations, and codes.

**Bidding Information:**

*   The bid submission deadline is April 30, 2024, at 17:00:00.
